lexUnit.name: arson.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the criminal act of deliberately setting fire to property.

sentence.text: Two weeks earlier , on March 15 , Mehrdad Kowkabi , an Iranian student held in the UK for 15 months , had been deported after a court dropped charges of arson against him , and Iranian officials had been quoted as saying that the government might respond to this " positive step " by releasing Cooper .
